Header.title: Japanese Kanji
Header.paragraph: More than 2,200 practical chinese characters with 20,000 words supporting it!

About.paragraph: I am a software engineer who works at start-up! I create intuitive apps for you

Features.title: Intuitive represented cards
Features.text: Japanese Card is esaily displayed with cognitive benefits!

Features.title: Multile Language support!
Features.text: Currently, Enlgish, French and Korean is supported

Features.title: Kanji Cards
Features.text: Quantity of 1 ~ 20 kanji cards will be delieverd at your ease!

Features.title: Flash cards
Features.text: You can learn japanese kanji with japanese words!

Services.name: Easy to use
Services.text: Always aim to create app which can be easily used

Services.name: Updates
Services.text: If ever there's one user using my app, I don't stop updating it

Services.name: Responsive
Services.text: For better customer service, I'm available 24 / 24
